chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our little adventure. Are you ready to navigate the map and find some hidden treasures?

Great! Now, let's start by moving towards the left. Can you see a small island with a leopard resting on it to your left? We need to pass just below the leopard. Go ahead and make your way towards the island.
I am now directly below the island!

Fantastic! Now, you'll notice a wooden twig that leads to a larger island ahead. Cross over that twig and make your way onto the larger island. On this island, you'll find a parrot and an elephant. Can you spot them?

Wonderful! Now, we need to go over the head of the parrot and then continue heading south, between the parrot and the elephant. Start by going over the head of the parrot, and then proceed south between the parrot and the elephant. Let me know when you've made it through.

Perfect! Now, we're leaving this island in a south-eastern direction. You'll see a path formed by three rocks: two gray ones and a darker one. Go ahead and cross over those rocks, following the path. Let me know once you're on the other side.

Great job! Now, we've reached a new island with a frog on it. We need to pass just below (south of) the frog. Carefully navigate below the frog and then do a u-turn to the left (west). Let me know when you've completed this maneuver.

Amazing! Now, we'll head back towards the island with the parrot and the elephant, but this time we're going left (west). Cross over the back of a crocodile to reach the island with the parrot and the elephant. Take your time and be careful while crossing. Let me know when you're safely on the island.

chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to follow the path and explore the map?
Great! Let's begin. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, next to a white dog. Start by taking a few steps to your left (west).
Good job! Now, continue walking below a wooden bench that you see in front of you.

Fantastic! Now, you will come across a stream. Cross the stream and head towards the florist stand, but don't reach it. Instead, make a u-turn to your left and cross the stream again, heading back towards the white dog.
Great progress! Now just near the white dog, you'll see a wooden branch that crosses a river. Cross over the branch, heading to the south. Keep moving southwards (down the map).

Excellent! As you continue southwards, you'll come across another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Pass over the picnic mat, touching a bowl of berries, and continue towards the west.
Great job! Now, just a little further west, you will see another wooden branch crossing the river. Cross over this branch to the north side of the river.

Perfect! After crossing the river, you'll notice a green bush in front of you. Instead of going straight through it, circle around the bush from the right side. Keep circling until you reach the florist stand.
Well done! Now, turn left (west) and go below the florist stand. You will see a big bridge ahead with two people riding a bicycle. Pass to the west side of the bridge.
Great progress! Just past the bridge, you'll notice two elderly people sitting on a bench, reading newspapers. Move a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch.
Almost there! Now, you will see a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch. Go east, between the branch and the bush. Take a few steps to the east.

chat.msg: Hello! Are you ready to navigate through our map and follow a fun path?
Great! Let's get started. You are currently at the opening of a tent in the north part of the map. Step south of the tent and follow the trail.
Awesome! Now that you're on the trail, keep heading east until you reach a small bonfire just north of the trail.
Great job! Now, instead of going past the bonfire, take a left (north) and continue east on the trail. Keep going until you see two red mushrooms.
Perfect! When you reach the two red mushrooms, make a U-turn by turning right. Go back west on the trail until you reach a fork in the road.
Excellent! At the fork, take the left (south) branch. Continue east, but make sure you pass to the east of a telescope along the way.
Great job! Now, after passing the telescope, you'll veer right and take a shortcut off the trail. Circle around the telescope and rejoin the trail heading west. Keep following the trail.

Fantastic! As you continue west on the trail, you'll eventually come across a low wall of rocks surrounding a wooden cabin. This is your final destination. Well done! You have successfully followed the path.
